column1: Smoque BBQ////We got a combo for $22 of 2 half racks of ribs (1 St. Louis
column3: 2 sides (peach cobbler and BBQ beans) and it comes with coleslaw as well. To that we added "a taste" of sausage and of chopped brisket
column6: we really got quite a lot- and took leftovers home! Next time
column7: I'd really want to try the chicken quarter. WOW
